headline: Palantir and Super Micro Computer Stocks Rise as  Broadcom Posts Strong AI Revenue
summary: Shares of  Palantir Technologies  and  Super Micro Computer  charged higher in premarket trading Friday after  Broadcom  posted a solid quarter underscored by robust artificial-intelligence demand.  CEO Hock Tan emphasized that strength in the fiscal second quarter was driven by “continued strength in AI semiconductors,” adding that hyperscaler clients were “unwavering in their plan to invest” despite economic uncertainty.  The results were welcome news for  Palantir  whose shares have come under pressure lately.
